GSD.product_version: versions from v5.0 to before v5.10.43
GSD.description:
neighbour: allow NUD_NOARP entries to be forced GCed

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.43 by commit d17d47da59f726dc4c87caebda3a50333d7e2fd3, it was introduced in version v5.0 by commit 58956317c8de52009d1a38a721474c24aef74fe7. For more details please see the references link.
